text: The Timid Terror is a 1926 American comedy film directed by Del Andrews and written by Gerald Duffy. The film stars George O'Hara, Edith Murgatroyd, Doris Hill, Rex Lease, George Nichols and Dot Farley. The film was released on November 7, 1926, by Film Booking Offices of America. ==Cast== *George O'Hara as Talbot Trent *Edith Murgatroyd as Mrs. Trent *Doris Hill as Dorothy Marvin *Rex Lease as Howard Cramm *George Nichols as Amos Milliken *Dot Farley as Mrs. Milliken ==References== ==External links== * Category:1926 films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:Film Booking Offices of America films Category:Films directed by Del Andrews Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1926 comedy films
title: The Timid Terror
